website_summaries.verdict: These insoles are designed to provide stability by nesting the feet comfortably within their high walls.
pros: The deep cup for the heel, combined with high insole walls, provide stability
Designed for casual and work shoes as well as walking shoes
Made of cork and EVA material, plus leather
cons: Getting the right fit is crucial, and wide widths aren't available

customer_reviews.title: Best non-custom insert I have purchased
customer_reviews.text: I have tried all sorts of inserts for a high arch and plantar fasciitis. Except for the expensive custom made inserts. This insert is great. Sure the Scholl's "custom" insert is $20 bucks less but this one works so much better ! Update 1/28/2019 - Used these for almost 9 months. They are great. Bought a second pair for another pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Great Movie

customer_reviews.title: great insert!
customer_reviews.text: These truly have made it easier to walk and help to heal my feet. You can't put a price on comfort. I am at the point in my life that is so important. I own several pairs of these inserts. several hundred dollar worth so I can wear different shoes. The only sandals I wear are Birkenstock.
customer_reviews.author: Mallgood

customer_reviews.title: ouch !
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this brand for about 10 years. This particular style digs into the side of the foot making it impossible to walk. I usually buy the blue ones and will from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too bulky
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping these inserts would be a bit thinner in order to fit in street shoes. As is, I can only use them in my sneakers. I love Birkenstock’s, but these inserts just don’t work in a ballet shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My knee adjusted in minutes.
customer_reviews.text: I am not pain-free in fact I was in excruciating pain for two days as my knees adjusted to a proper stance. Literally, within 5 minutes my knee was cracking and adjusting after putting these in. But now I am doing better.
customer_reviews.author: lil.cranky

customer_reviews.title: Great for my feet.
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended this to me for my troubled feet that was sprained a few months ago.. It is firm and supportive,. Takes a bit of time to get used to, but then it feels VERY good for my feet and arches.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: yes they are expensive but they are helpful so I really love them. I use them in my boots and it helps to cushion my heel, as well as support my ankles a bit.
customer_reviews.author: GenuineImitation

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good support but didn't fit in most of my shoes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: awesome arch support
customer_reviews.text: The arch supports I've used for years are no longer available. I tried these on the advice of my sister. They work really well and I'm happy to have them. I just wish they weren't so expensive.
customer_reviews.author: LoriC

customer_reviews.title: They work!!
customer_reviews.text: These inserts work!!!! This is my third pair....if you have heal pain, don't pay hundreds of bucks, try these inserts, they work, they work they work!
customer_reviews.author: FastEddy

customer_reviews.title: Must buy inserts
customer_reviews.text: These are life changing. After plantar fasciitis, THIS AND BIRKENSTOCKS are the only way my feet from better. Now I am happy to wear all of my shoes now that I have these.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this item!
customer_reviews.text: Keep in mind this is a non-returnable item! Mine came damaged and I could not return them.
customer_reviews.author: William L.

customer_reviews.title: Sent me the wrong item!
customer_reviews.text: I received the blue insoles and returned them. Really needed them last week.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Hoofer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Insoles
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many Birkenstock insoles in the past. They are the only ones that seem to help my plantar fasciitis. I use these in every pair of shoes I wear or in slippers around the house. Between wearing these and doing daily foot stretches the only time my feet hurt is right when I wake up in the morning, but that goes away as soon as I stretch my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Ott

customer_reviews.title: NO RETURNS
customer_reviews.text: Very hard. Hurt my feet. They won’t accept returns. This should be noted in BOLD in the product description!!!
customer_reviews.author: Klh814

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as high arch support. No support at all. Package came crushed and worn as if it had been placed under hundreds of pounds for a long period of time. And they are not eligible for returns.
customer_reviews.author: Willowmea

customer_reviews.title: Relief for my feet
customer_reviews.text: These make my shoes more comfortable. I put them under the insoles that came with the shoes. They seem like they will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: The Inserts work amazing.
customer_reviews.text: the inserts are amazing. I have a heal spur and these insert works. Before inserts my heal would be aching after work. I also play racquetball and use to twist my ankles constantly. After inserts I have not twisted my ankles for over year and my heal feels perfect after a long day at work. I use to buy from a shoe store SAS but they got to expensive so I tried amazon and low and behold I saved $25. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin N.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these for all of my flat shoes. Helps tremendously with my planter fasciitis pain too! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: EV

customer_reviews.title: I've used these for years. They've helped put an ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used these for years. They've helped put an end to my planters fasciitis heel pain. Four stars due to pice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: shoe inserts
customer_reviews.text: I loved it... I used the product as shoe inserts ...
customer_reviews.author: Eric Matos

customer_reviews.title: Ah, comfort at last!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in my fifties and starting to have aches in my knees. My feet always hurt, whether i wear sneakers or some of those expensive shoes that guarantee comfort. I've wished that i could wear comfy flats but they have no support. Birkenstocks are the only comfy shoes i could find. These inserts can turn any casual shoe into a Birkenstock shoe. They're fairlywide and i do not think they would fit into a dress shoe. I tend to supinate (roll outward) when I walk and these inserts are high enough to keep my feet from turning out. I also have a surgically fused ankle, and the inserts support it beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: D. M. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: These are great if you work on cement floors all day.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Helps my feet
customer_reviews.text: Used in my walking shoes and enables me to walk comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you choose your size
customer_reviews.text: These insoles arrived quickly and packaged very well. Unfortunately I didn't see a place to order a "size" of insole so I thought they were one size fits all. I had to return them to the company about 3 weeks ago and haven't heard from them or received my size insoles.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey S

customer_reviews.title: Have to wear these in every pair of non-birkenstock or ...
customer_reviews.text: Have to wear these in every pair of non-birkenstock or dansko shoe. Keeps the fleshy part of the heel under the bone, and supports the arch.
customer_reviews.author: Emmy W.

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: The sides of the insoles dug into my foot and were very uncomfortable. As suggested, I trimmed them, but they still hurt. The front end (toward the toes) also hurt my feet. I couldn't wear these insoles. Wish I could return them.
customer_reviews.author: Jo-Jo

customer_reviews.title: It was so painful to get out of bed and walk
customer_reviews.text: It really has helped my plantar facitetis. It was so painful to get out of bed and walk. I can tell if I am NOT wearing it with other shoes. Feet are important! Take care of them!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband wants these for all his shoes now. He LOVES these insoles.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought these to wear indoors after months of pain from ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to wear indoors after months of pain from plantar fasciitis. Pain free when wearing these with slippers indoors.
customer_reviews.author: Condorman

customer_reviews.title: These arch supports work like nothing I’ve tried before
customer_reviews.text: These arch supports work like nothing I’ve tried before. I have heel issues and the minute I put these in my shoes the pain was gone!! A little expensive, but worth every penny as to not have pain when I walk anymore!
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Great help for plantar fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing these the past three weeks and my plantar fasciitis is almost all but gone.
customer_reviews.author: R. Graziani

customer_reviews.title: Great arch supports
customer_reviews.text: Been having trouble with Plantar Fasciitis and these arch supports give huge relief. Shoe makers seem to have gotten "cheap" and most shoes do not provide adequate arch support. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: James M317

customer_reviews.title: extra firm
customer_reviews.text: a little stiff, but love the support. They fit into my running shoes and give me the support that I need for my high arches.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Booker

customer_reviews.title: Love these. Really help the pain from my plantar ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Really help the pain from my plantar fasciitis.
customer_reviews.author: DarleneP

customer_reviews.title: Great Berkinstock support.
customer_reviews.text: Feet dont hurt as much anymore. On my feet all day on concrete and these have helped tremendously!
customer_reviews.author: KEVIN

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great and fit in most of my shoes. They give really great support.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle  Taggart

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome! They really helped with the pain of my ...
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! They really helped with the pain of my Plantar Fasciitis! I’m on my feet 10 or more hours a day at work & these were a godsend! I bought another pair for other shoes !
customer_reviews.author: Jon Frey

customer_reviews.title: lifesavers
customer_reviews.text: so happy to have found these. They can turn any shoe into a shoe I can wear. thanks, I will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: larry flint

customer_reviews.title: ... feet and i have tried everything and this works better than anything i have tried plan on buying it ...
customer_reviews.text: I have flat feet and i have tried everything and this works better than anything i have tried plan on buying it again
customer_reviews.author: JONAS T.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these insloes. They help my back. They last over2 years.
customer_reviews.author: C C .

customer_reviews.title: Doctor Recommended !
customer_reviews.text: The insoles worked great I no longer have the pain in my heel and can again walk on my treadmill. I do plan on buying another set. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Marion

customer_reviews.title: Best footbeds I have found (and I've pretty much tried them all!)
customer_reviews.text: I have spent over $2000 on custom footbeds and insoles from podiatrists, chiropractors, and other so-called professionals and none have provided the relief that these insoles have. I've had terrible pain in the ball of the foot for over a decade. The design of these footbeds re-distribute one's weight in such a way as to remove the pressure from the ball of the foot. If you've got discomfort in the ball of the foot, give these a try. I tried them in three different shoes and in every pair it was instant relief. I'm purchasing them for all my shoes...what a find!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Summary of the product
customer_reviews.text: I actually returned this item because it didn't fit all of my shoes/sandals as I wanted them to. I am sure other people have found this product satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: Margie Shouse

customer_reviews.title: Only for certain type shoes
customer_reviews.text: Can only be worn in shoes such as tennis shoes. Can't wear with flats. Makes your foot rise up too high and you fall out of your dress shoes.
customer_reviews.author: mbd

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are too ridged to be comfortable on my feet. I have a tender arch instep.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Batchelor

customer_reviews.title: Firm arch
customer_reviews.text: There's a ridge at the toes end that takes some getting used to. They do the job, website is faulty cause you want caus you didn't select one. you select a size at start, then it drops it and you go on without that info all the way to click it to buy. Amazon then calls next day & asks for the size.
customer_reviews.author: glen2015

customer_reviews.title: I use them in my boots and couldn't be more satisfied. Could also be used in athletic shoes as ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a bout of plantar fasciitis a few months ago , I have since, been wearing orthotics in all my shoes, with no recurrent episodes. These give full support to my very high arches and prevent over pronation. I use them in my boots and couldn't be more satisfied. Could also be used in athletic shoes as well.
customer_reviews.author: Yogababebk

customer_reviews.title: Physical Therapist approved
customer_reviews.text: My physical therapist wanted me to get insoles to help with knee pain and thought a store bought one wouldn't be good enough and I would need an expensive custom pair. When she saw me wearing these, she was very impressed and decided, I should be good to go now. This, in combination with exercise has made my knee pain go away completely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smell Awful, No Returns
customer_reviews.text: First..the smell is horrendous, like mold. Did not use because they hurt to use. Can't return. So that's 60 dollars thrown away.
customer_reviews.author: Cindysaysyes

customer_reviews.title: cork equals comfy
customer_reviews.text: More comfortable than hard plastic orthotics. Be sure to size your foot correctly -- otherwise will cause irritation or pain in the soles.
customer_reviews.author: Z Borus

customer_reviews.title: Good support- but hard!
customer_reviews.text: This gives good support but is hard as a rock. It needs some cushioning. It fits in most of my shoes.
customer_reviews.author: NAF

customer_reviews.title: My feet are happy
customer_reviews.text: I have plantar fasciitis and these have been the only insoles that have made my feet happy. Sure they are a little expensive but they are effective. How can you put a price tag on that??????
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Wide insoles
customer_reviews.text: I had a lot of hope for these insoles since I love my Birks. Surprisingly, though, these did not fit any of my shoes because they are too wide. Had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: keikoatl

product_meta.title: Birkenstock Birko Balance Arch Support Maximum Stability - Casual/Work
product_meta.description: Birkenstock Unisex Birko Balance 3/4 Medium Arch Support. This are great arch support insoles for plantar fasciitis and other foot or heel pain. Your feet will love the feel of orthotic shoe insoles and your shoes will get an amazing makeover with this inserts. They are a great addition to your shoe wardrobe and will refresh your favorite pair of shoes!
